extension.summary:
Watch NHK World in HD - live stream and on-demand programs</summa
Watch NHK World in HD - includes live stream and on-demand programs.
The plugin is optimized for an Internet connection with at least 10 MBIT.
I built this plugin because NHK does not support Android TV (yet).
Originally based on Misty's Best Of NHK plugin (https://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=196657) but not related any longer. His plugin also provides addtional content like NHK on Youtube.
This plugin is a fan project and not related in any way to NHK! all GPL-3.0
